item.text: Now King Ben Hadad of Syria assembled all his army, along with 32 other kings with their horses and chariots. He marched against Samaria and besieged and attacked it.

He <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="04397" class="">messengers</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, who was in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="03541" class="">This is what</st> <st data-num="01130" class="">Ben Hadad</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">says</st>:

‘Your <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> and your <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">are</st> mine, as well as <st data-num="01992" class="">the</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">best</st> of your <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> and <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>.’”
The king of Israel replied, “It is just as you say, my master, O king. I and all I own belong to you.”
The messengers came again and said, “This is what Ben Hadad says: ‘I sent this message to you, “You must give me your silver, gold, wives, and sons.”

<st data-num="03588 0518">But</st> now at this <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> <st data-num="04279" class="">tomorrow</st> I will <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> my <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you and they will <st data-num="02664" class="">search through</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">palace</st> and your <st data-num="05650" class="">servants’</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st>. They will <st data-num="01961 07760 03027 03947">carry away</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="04261 05869">valuables</st>.’”<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">summoned</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">leaders</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03045 04994 07200">Notice</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">how</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this man</st> is <st data-num="01245" class="">looking for</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">trouble</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">Indeed</st>, he <st data-num="07971 0413">demanded</st> my <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, and <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, and I did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04513 04480">resist</st> him.”

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">leaders</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">and</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">give in</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="014" class="">agree to</st> his <st data-num="014" class="">demands</st>.”<n id="1" />

So he said to the messengers of Ben Hadad, “Say this to my master, the king: ‘I will give you everything you demanded at first from your servant, but I am unable to agree to this latest demand.’” So the messengers went back and gave their report.
Ben Hadad sent another message to him, “May the gods judge me severely if there is enough dirt left in Samaria for all my soldiers to scoop up in their hands.”

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">replied</st>, “<st data-num="01696" class="">Tell</st> him the one who <st data-num="02296" class="">puts on</st> his <st data-num="02296" class="">battle gear</st> should <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01984" class="">boast</st> like one who is <st data-num="06605" class="">taking</st> it <st data-num="06605" class="">off</st>.”<n id="1" />
When Ben Hadad received this reply, he and the other kings were drinking in their quarters. He ordered his servants, “Get ready to attack!” So they got ready to attack the city.

Now a prophet visited King Ahab of Israel and said, “This is what the Lord has said: ‘Do you see this huge army? Look, I am going to hand it over to you this very day. Then you will know that I am the Lord.’”

Ahab asked, “By whom will this be accomplished?” He answered, “This is what the Lord has said, ‘By the servants of the district governors.’” Ahab asked, “Who will launch the attack?” He answered, “You will.”
So Ahab assembled the 232 servants of the district governors. After that he assembled all the Israelite army, numbering 7,000.

They <st data-num="03318" class="">marched out</st> at <st data-num="06672" class="">noon</st>, while <st data-num="01130 01931">Ben Hadad</st> and the <st data-num="07970 08147" class="">32</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="05826" class="">allied</st> with him were <st data-num="08354" class="">drinking</st> <st data-num="07910" class="">heavily</st><n id="1" /> in their <st data-num="05521" class="">quarters</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="05288" class="">servants</st> of the <st data-num="04082" class="">district</st> <st data-num="08269" class="">governors</st> <st data-num="07223" class="">led</st> the <st data-num="03318" class="">march</st>. When <st data-num="01130" class="">Ben Hadad</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> messengers, they <st data-num="05046 0559">reported</st> back to him, “<st data-num="0582" class="">Men</st> are <st data-num="03318" class="">marching out</st> of <st data-num="08111" class="">Samaria</st>.”<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="0559" class="">ordered</st>, “<st data-num="0518" class="">Whether</st> they <st data-num="03318" class="">come</st> in <st data-num="07965" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">or</st> to do <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st>, <st data-num="08610" class="">take</st> them <st data-num="02416" class="">alive</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="0428" class="">They</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">marched out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> with the <st data-num="05288" class="">servants</st> of the <st data-num="04082" class="">district</st> <st data-num="08269" class="">governors</st> in the lead and the <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st> <st data-num="0834 0310">behind</st> them.

<st data-num="0376" class="">Each one</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">struck down</st> an <st data-num="0376" class="">enemy soldier</st>;<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrians</st> <st data-num="05127" class="">fled</st> and <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="07291" class="">chased</st> them. <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01130" class="">Ben Hadad</st> of <st data-num="0758" class="">Syria</st> <st data-num="04422" class="">escaped</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horseback</st> with some <st data-num="06571" class="">horsemen</st>.
Then the king of Israel marched out and struck down the horses and chariots; he thoroughly defeated Syria.
The prophet visited the king of Israel and instructed him, “Go, fortify your defenses. Determine what you must do, for in the spring the king of Syria will attack you.”

Now the <st data-num="05650" class="">advisers</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0758" class="">Syria</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him: “Their <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> is a <st data-num="0430" class="">god</st> of the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st>. <st data-num="05921 03651">That’s why</st> they <st data-num="02388 04480">overpowered</st> us. <st data-num="0199" class="">But if</st> we <st data-num="03898 0854">fight</st> them in the <st data-num="04334" class="">plains</st>, we will <st data-num="0518 03808">certainly</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">overpower</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>.

So <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="01697 02088">this</st>: <st data-num="05493" class="">Dismiss</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="0376 04725">from their command</st>, and <st data-num="07760 08478">replace</st> them with <st data-num="06346" class="">military commanders</st>.

Muster an army like the one you lost, with the same number of horses and chariots. Then we will fight them in the plains; we will certainly overpower them.” He approved their plan and did as they advised.
In the spring Ben Hadad mustered the Syrian army and marched to Aphek to fight Israel.

When the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> had <st data-num="06485" class="">mustered</st> and <st data-num="03557" class="">received</st> their <st data-num="03557" class="">supplies</st>, they <st data-num="01980" class="">marched out</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">face</st> them <st data-num="07125" class="">in battle</st>. When the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="02583" class="">deployed</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> them, they were like <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02835" class="">small flocks</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="05795" class="">goats</st>, but the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrians</st> <st data-num="04390" class="">filled</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

The prophet visited the king of Israel and said, “This is what the Lord has said: ‘Because the Syrians said, “The Lord is a god of the mountains and not a god of the valleys,” I will deliver this entire huge army into to your control. Then you will know that I am the Lord.’”
The armies were deployed opposite each other for seven days. On the seventh day the battle began, and the Israelites killed 100,000 Syrian foot soldiers in one day.

The <st data-num="03498" class="">remaining</st> <st data-num="06242 07651 0505">27,000</st> <st data-num="05127" class="">ran</st> to <st data-num="0663" class="">Aphek</st> and went <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, but the <st data-num="02346" class="">wall</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0376 03498">them</st>.<n id="1" /> Now <st data-num="01130" class="">Ben Hadad</st> <st data-num="05127 0935">ran</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and hid in an <st data-num="02315" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="02315" class="">room</st>.<n id="2" />

His <st data-num="05650" class="">advisers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="02009 04994">Look</st>, we have <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">dynasty</st> <st data-num="03588 04428 01992">are</st> <st data-num="02617" class="">kind</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="04994" class="">Allow</st> us to <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> <st data-num="08242" class="">sackcloth</st> around our <st data-num="04975" class="">waists</st> and <st data-num="02256" class="">ropes</st> on our <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="03318" class="">surrender</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>. <st data-num="0194" class="">Maybe</st> he will <st data-num="02421" class="">spare</st> our <st data-num="05315" class="">lives</st>.”

So they <st data-num="02296" class="">put</st> <st data-num="08242" class="">sackcloth</st> around their <st data-num="04975" class="">waists</st> and <st data-num="02256" class="">ropes</st> on their <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>. They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01130" class="">Ben Hadad</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">says</st>, ‘<st data-num="04994" class="">Please</st> let <st data-num="05315" class="">me</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>!’” Ahab<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “Is he <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">alive</st>? <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> is my <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>.”<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="05172" class="">took</st> this <st data-num="05172" class="">as a good omen</st> and <st data-num="04116" class="">quickly</st> <st data-num="02480" class="">accepted</st> his <st data-num="04480" class="">offer</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="01130" class="">Ben Hadad</st> is your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>.” Ahab<n id="1" /> then <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0935" class="">Go</st>, <st data-num="03947" class="">get</st> him.” So <st data-num="01130" class="">Ben Hadad</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">came out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, and Ahab <st data-num="05927" class="">pulled</st> him <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">into</st> his <st data-num="04818" class="">chariot</st>.

Ben Hadad said, “I will return the cities my father took from your father. You may set up markets in Damascus, just as my father did in Samaria.” Ahab then said, “I want to make a treaty with you before I dismiss you.” So he made a treaty with him and then dismissed him.
One of the members of the prophetic guild told his companion a message from the Lord, “Please wound me!” But the man refused to wound him.
So the prophet said to him, “Because you have disobeyed the Lord, as soon as you leave me a lion will kill you.” When he left him, a lion attacked and killed him.

He <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="05221 04994">Wound</st> me!” So the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">wounded</st> him <st data-num="05221 06481">severely</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> then <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="05975" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st>, waiting for the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>. He also <st data-num="02664" class="">disguised</st> himself by putting a <st data-num="0666" class="">bandage</st> down <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> his <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st>.

<st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">passed by</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> <st data-num="06817 0559">called out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, “Your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">went out</st> into the <st data-num="07130" class="">heat</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">then</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">turned aside</st> and <st data-num="0935 0413">brought</st> me a <st data-num="0376" class="">prisoner</st>.<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st> me, ‘<st data-num="08104" class="">Guard</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">prisoner</st>. <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="06485" class="">ends up missing</st> <st data-num="06485" class="">for any reason</st>,<n id="3" /> you will <st data-num="08254" class="">pay</st> <st data-num="01961 08478">with</st> your <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> with a <st data-num="03603" class="">talent</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>.’<n id="5" />

Well, it just so <st data-num="01961" class="">happened</st> that while your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> was <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="02008" class="">this</st> and <st data-num="02008" class="">that</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">disappeared</st>.” The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “Your <st data-num="04941" class="">punishment</st> is already <st data-num="02782" class="">determined</st> by <st data-num="0859" class="">your</st> own <st data-num="03651" class="">testimony</st>.”<n id="1" />

The prophet<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04116" class="">quickly</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st> the <st data-num="0666" class="">bandage</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> his <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st>, and the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="05234 03588">recognized</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was one of the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophets</st>.

The prophet then said to him, “This is what the Lord has said: ‘Because you released a man I had determined should die, you will pay with your life, and your people will suffer instead of his people.’”
The king of Israel went home to Samaria bitter and angry.
